overview: A special BBC programme on the life and music of David Bowie, presented by Jeremy Vine. Bowie was one of the most influential musicians of his time, constantly re-inventing his persona and sound, from the 1960s hippy of Space Oddity, through Ziggy Stardust and the Thin White Duke to his later incarnation as a soulful rocker.
tagline: Explore the music and influence of the iconic space oddity.
title: David Bowie: Sound and Vision
